text: Your savings deposit has been reversed due to a mistake.
text_esp: Su depósito de ahorro ha sido revertido debido a un error.

text: We are happy to inform you that your insurance claim has been approved.
text_esp: Nos complace informarle que su reclamo de seguro ha sido aprobado.

text: Your savings deposit has been reversed because of a transactional error.
text_esp: Su depósito de ahorros ha sido revertido debido a un error transaccional.

text: You received a gift from a family member. It's in your account.
text_esp: Recibiste un regalo de un familiar. Está en tu cuenta.

text: You have beenCONGRATULATIONS. Your account has earned a bonus interest.
text_esp: Has sido FELICIDADES. Su cuenta ha obtenido un interés adicional.

text: Your payment has been deposited into your account.
text_esp: Su pago ha sido depositado en su cuenta.

text: Your savings account has earned $25 in interest this month.
text_esp: Su cuenta de ahorros ha ganado $25 en intereses este mes.

text: Your personal line of credit has been suspended because of missed payments. Please contact us to discuss repayment options.
text_esp: Su línea de crédito personal ha sido suspendida debido a pagos atrasados. Comuníquese con nosotros para analizar las opciones de pago.

text: You've received a financial award of $300 for your outstanding contribution to the community.
text_esp: Ha recibido un premio financiero de $300 por su destacada contribución a la comunidad.

text: We're sorry to inform you that there is a discrepancy. $300 has been deducted pending verification
text_esp: Lamentamos informarle que existe una discrepancia. Se han deducido $300 pendiente de verificación

text: Your contribution has been processed.
text_esp: Su contribución ha sido procesada.

text: Your $300 contribution to your child's education fund has been processed.
text_esp: Se ha procesado su contribución de $300 al fondo de educación de su hijo.

text: You have succeeded. Your credit card payment has been made.
text_esp: Lo has logrado. Se ha realizado el pago con tarjeta de crédito.

text: Great news. Identity theft protection is included in your insurance coverage.
text_esp: Una gran noticia. La protección contra el robo de identidad está incluida en la cobertura de su seguro.

text: Your $100 automatic savings transfer has been processed twice. The error is being corrected.
text_esp: Su transferencia de ahorro automática de $100 se procesó dos veces. El error se está corrigiendo.

text: Your insurance claim for $200 has been approved and will be reimbursed to you shortly.
text_esp: Su reclamo de seguro por $200 ha sido aprobado y se le reembolsará en breve.

text: We're sorry to inform you that your mortgage payment is late. Immediate action is needed to avoid foreclosures.
text_esp: Lamentamos informarle que el pago de su hipoteca está retrasado. Se necesita acción inmediata para evitar ejecuciones hipotecarias.

text: Great job on meeting your savings goal $500 has been deposited into your account.
text_esp: Excelente trabajo para alcanzar su meta de ahorro. Se han depositado $500 en su cuenta.

text: Unfortunately, your investment dividends for this quarter have been lower than anticipated. $100 less has been credited to your account.
text_esp: Desafortunadamente, sus dividendos de inversión para este trimestre han sido menores de lo previsto. Se han acreditado $100 menos en su cuenta.

text: You have deposited $400 into your emergency fund. Well done, well done
text_esp: Ha depositado $400 en su fondo de emergencia. Bien hecho, bien hecho

text: Due to eligibility criteria not being met, your referral bonus of $50 cannot be processed.
text_esp: Debido a que no se cumplen los criterios de elegibilidad, su bono por recomendación de $50 no se puede procesar.

text: Your investment portfolio has lost $500 this month.
text_esp: Su cartera de inversiones ha perdido $500 este mes.

text: We're happy to inform you that you have earned $50 in credit card rewards.
text_esp: Nos complace informarle que ha ganado $50 en recompensas de tarjetas de crédito.

text: You've earned $50 in rewards. Enjoy.
text_esp: Has ganado $50 en recompensas. Disfrutar.

text: Your credit card account has been suspended due to non-payment If you want to reactivate your account, please settle the outstanding balance
text_esp: Su cuenta de tarjeta de crédito ha sido suspendida debido a falta de pago. Si desea reactivar su cuenta, liquide el saldo pendiente.

text: Great job on your proactive insurance planning! You're prepared for unexpected events.
text_esp: ¡Excelente trabajo en su planificación proactiva de seguros! Estás preparado para eventos inesperados.

text: We're happy to inform you that your investment in renewable energy stocks yielded a profit of $300.
text_esp: Nos complace informarle que su inversión en acciones de energía renovable generó una ganancia de $300.

text: Your credit card statement shows a balance of $500, which has been automatically deducted from your account.
text_esp: El extracto de su tarjeta de crédito muestra un saldo de $500, que se ha deducido automáticamente de su cuenta.

text: Your savings account has been compromised, and we apologize. Please contact us as soon as possible.
text_esp: Su cuenta de ahorros ha sido comprometida y le pedimos disculpas. Por favor contáctenos lo antes posible.

text: Great news! Your credit card application has been approved and will be mailed to you soon.
text_esp: ¡Una gran noticia! Su solicitud de tarjeta de crédito ha sido aprobada y se le enviará por correo pronto.

text: Your rental income of $1000 has been successfully credited to your account.
text_esp: Su ingreso por alquiler de $1000 se ha acreditado exitosamente en su cuenta.

text: Your insurance policy now offers additional benefits, including roadside assistance and towing services.
text_esp: Su póliza de seguro ahora ofrece beneficios adicionales, que incluyen asistencia en carretera y servicios de remolque.

text: Your insurance policy now covers rental car reimbursement, we're excited to inform you.
text_esp: Su póliza de seguro ahora cubre el reembolso del alquiler del vehículo, nos complace informarle.

text: The home equity line of credit payment is past due. We can discuss repayment options.
text_esp: El pago de la línea de crédito sobre el valor líquido de la vivienda está vencido. Podemos discutir opciones de pago.

text: You have earned $50 in rewards for your purchases. Enjoy it.
text_esp: Has ganado $50 en recompensas por tus compras. Disfrútala.

text: Due to non-payment, your mortgage has entered foreclosure proceedings.
text_esp: Por impago, tu hipoteca ha entrado en proceso de ejecución hipotecaria.

text: Your $300 contribution has been processed.
text_esp: Su contribución de $300 ha sido procesada.

text: Your investment in mutual funds has earned you dividends. Keep up the good work.
text_esp: Su inversión en fondos mutuos le ha reportado dividendos. Sigan con el buen trabajo.

text: The emergency fund withdrawal of $400 has been delayed due to processing issues.
text_esp: El retiro del fondo de emergencia de $400 se retrasó debido a problemas de procesamiento.

text: Your investment portfolio lost $500 this month.
text_esp: Su cartera de inversiones perdió $500 este mes.
